channel.title: New side project
channel.description: I am currently working on Rune-Pact, but I would also like to work on a side project. Does anyone have a base suggestion that I could build from, excluding bases like Project Insanity and Delta. I have nothing against them; however, I want to work on something that is more stable when it comes to the framework and the network. Also, tell me about the pros and cons of the base.

item.title: New side project
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:5, topic:458574”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=561486.msg4095964#msg4095964 date=1346830914]

You do know you can stabilize the bases, right? I’m not questioning your judgement, but it’s not like they’re so unstable that the moment 2 people log on the engine load jumps to 100%. Some of the PI servers have Netty networking (I think it’s called) and can hold thousands of players.

I held 600 no problem on an unedited PI.
[/quote]
I’m pretty sure people think PI is unstable because of how bad DSPK and Hybrid PvP was.[/quote]
I have nothing against PI. My main project is based off of PI. I want to start a side project to expand my knowledge.

Read full topic
